data.convo: Is this the A housing office ? Yes , it is . Are you looking for housing for this semester ? I was hoping to get into something on campus , but my friend told me that everything is full . It is , but I can put you on a waiting list , if you would like . Please . And in the mean time , can I look at apartments available in the area from this office ? Yes , here is a catalog that is put out every year with locations that meet campus requirements for As . Who do I talk to if I want I to see some of them ? The individual landlord's numbers are next to each entry . You can call them with any questions you may have .
